title: Making Friends Is Hard
itunes:title: Making Friends Is Hard
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
As if school wasn't hard enough....

***

Written by TheNerdyGirlNextDoor and narrated by Michelle Kane, Danielle Hewitt, Megan McDuffee, and Molly Lankford

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
